actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, to the Imperial Valley College Barker Museum of El Centro, California, specified lands near Ocotillo, California, for use as a museum. Reserves a right of reversion to the United States should such lands be used for other than public park, including museum, and recreational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.
